title: Bergentrückung

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect two people tonight with Basic defense. If both of them are attacked during the same night, it will become invincible.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You think you do not deserve to be spared, so you can't defend yourself.
- If you successfully protect someone with your ability, you can turn into ASGORE during the day.

desc:
Post 364A
*I so badly want to ask, do you want a cup of tea?*
